name: Babushka Shopping Spree
description:
As a gradma, you must collect ( close!) enough items in the cart according to the shopping list and go to the cashier as fast as you can! 

Credits:

Jarosław Forlański, Paweł Mazurek - Programmer

Ola Zakrzewska - 3D modelling

Zuza Zagórska,  Krzysiek Łaszcz- 3D modeling, Game Design

Marcin Łaszcz- Music developer
